channel.title: How to fix the combat tab?
channel.description:
Hi, Im using this new client and they completely messed up the combat tab, I already added alot of new items to the game and I didn't realize this when I was working, anyone have any way to add the old combat tab? I can't rep ++ but ill love u for life :) Or if possible a guide to add the old or new combat tab that really works.
[IMG]http://i26.tinypic.com/dgjl38.jpg[/img]

item.title: How to fix the combat tab?
item.dc:creator: @badger41 badger41
item.description:
@badger41 wrote:

to get the old weapon interface just go into class9 and search for something that you think would be in the name of the interface (for instance, “weapon”, “combat”) and remove the whole interface from class9

Read full topic
item.source: How to fix the combat tab?
